channel.title: 2025-03-05s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-03-05s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Iterative Value Function Optimization for Guided Decoding
item.description: IVO: Iterative Value Function Optimization for Guided Decoding

item.title: Language Models can Self-Improve at State-Value Estimation for Better Search
item.description: Self-Taught Lookahead improves LLM search via self-supervision, matching costly methods at a fraction of the compute!

item.title: Mask-DPO: Generalizable Fine-grained Factuality Alignment of LLMs
item.description: Mask-DPO: Fine-grained Factuality Alignment improves LLMs’ factuality by masking sentence-level errors during DPO training for enhanced knowledge alignment.

item.title: Q-Eval-100K: Evaluating Visual Quality and Alignment Level for Text-to-Vision Content
item.description: Q-Eval-100K: A new, large dataset for evaluating visual quality and text alignment in AI-generated content.

item.title: RectifiedHR: Enable Efficient High-Resolution Image Generation via Energy Rectification
item.description: RectifiedHR: Enables training-free high-resolution image generation via energy rectification, boosting both efficiency and effectiveness.

item.title: SPIDER: A Comprehensive Multi-Organ Supervised Pathology Dataset and Baseline Models
item.description: SPIDER: A comprehensive pathology dataset boosts AI diagnostic models.

item.title: Wikipedia in the Era of LLMs: Evolution and Risks
item.description: LLMs modestly affect Wikipedia, subtly altering content and potentially skewing NLP benchmarks.

item.title: MultiAgentBench: Evaluating the Collaboration and Competition of LLM agents
item.description: MultiAgentBench: A benchmark for evaluating collaboration and competition in LLM agents across diverse, interactive scenarios with novel metrics and protocols.

item.title: SemViQA: A Semantic Question Answering System for Vietnamese Information Fact-Checking
item.description: SemViQA: A new approach to boost Vietnamese fact-checking with semantic understanding and efficient evidence retrieval.

item.title: FR-Spec: Accelerating Large-Vocabulary Language Models via Frequency-Ranked Speculative Sampling
item.description: FR-Spec: Frequency-Ranked Speculative Sampling accelerates LLMs by optimizing vocabulary space compression, achieving 1.12x speedup over EAGLE-2.
